def_en: You use considering to indicate that you are thinking about a particular fact when making a judgment or giving an opinion.
You use considering that to indicate that you are thinking about a particular fact when making a judgment or giving an opinion.

def_cn: 通盘考虑;从各方面考虑
def_en: When you are giving an opinion or making a judgment, you can use considering to suggest that you have thought about all the circumstances, and often that something has succeeded in spite of these circumstances.
